meanings.definition: Having a great deal of money; wealthy.
meanings.sent1: The affluent businessman owned a big mansion.
meanings.sent2: She lived in an affluent neighborhood with expensive houses.
meanings.sent3: The affluent family's pet dog had a diamond-studded collar.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was so affluent, it looked like a designer store.
meanings.sent5: The affluent lifestyle of the movie star was the envy of many.

meanings.sent1: The affluent often donate to charity to help others.
meanings.sent2: An affluent can afford to travel first class around the world.
meanings.sent3: The affluent at the party were dressed in elegant attire.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the town's most generous affluent.
meanings.sent5: The affluent's luxury car gleamed in the sunlight.
